Shotomuli.description: Endemic to Eastern Himalayas. Threatened by habitat loss and overharvesting for medicinal use.

Agnishikha.description: Deciduous forest species from Western Ghats. Population declining due to urbanization.

Anantamul.description: Hemidesmus indicus. Overharvested for Ayurvedic medicine. Protected under NTFP in Kerala.

Hemidesmus indicus.description: Hemidesmus indicus. Overharvested for Ayurvedic medicine. Protected under NTFP in Kerala.

Apang.description: Achyranthes aspera. Widespread but monitored for sustainable use in traditional medicine.

Achyranthes aspera.description: Achyranthes aspera. Widespread but monitored for sustainable use in traditional medicine.

Ayapan.description: Eupatorium triplinerve. Native to Amazon but endangered in Indian Western Ghats due to habitat fragmentation.

Eupatorium triplinerve.description: Eupatorium triplinerve. Native to Amazon but endangered in Indian Western Ghats due to habitat fragmentation.

Bamonhati.description: Endemic to Assam's rainforests. <200 mature individuals remain (IUCN 2023).

Basok.description: Clerodendrum viscosum. Common but protected in Karnataka's sacred groves.

Clerodendrum viscosum.description: Clerodendrum viscosum. Common but protected in Karnataka's sacred groves.

Betal.description: Piper betle. Cultivated widely but wild variants need study. Potential genetic erosion.

Piper betle.description: Piper betle. Cultivated widely but wild variants need study. Potential genetic erosion.

Chapalish.description: Artocarpus chama. Threatened by logging in Meghalaya. CITES Appendix II listed.

Artocarpus chama.description: Artocarpus chama. Threatened by logging in Meghalaya. CITES Appendix II listed.

Gainura.description: Calamus rotang. Overexploited for cane furniture. Protected under Wildlife Protection Act Schedule VI.

Calamus rotang.description: Calamus rotang. Overexploited for cane furniture. Protected under Wildlife Protection Act Schedule VI.

Kalochitra.description: Memecylon umbellatum. <50 mature plants in Silent Valley National Park (Kerala).

Memecylon umbellatum.description: Memecylon umbellatum. <50 mature plants in Silent Valley National Park (Kerala).

Kalodhutura.description: Datura metel. Wild populations declining due to pesticide drift in agricultural zones.

Datura metel.description: Datura metel. Wild populations declining due to pesticide drift in agricultural zones.

Kalomegh.description: Andrographis paniculata. Cultivated extensively but wild gene pool protected in Odisha.

Andrographis paniculata.description: Andrographis paniculata. Cultivated extensively but wild gene pool protected in Odisha.

Punarnava.description: Boerhavia diffusa. IUCN notes 30% habitat loss in Deccan Plateau since 2000.

Boerhavia diffusa.description: Boerhavia diffusa. IUCN notes 30% habitat loss in Deccan Plateau since 2000.

Ramtulsi.description: Ocimum tenuiflorum. Sacred plant with stable populations but monitored for genetic diversity.

Ocimum tenuiflorum.description: Ocimum tenuiflorum. Sacred plant with stable populations but monitored for genetic diversity.

Sarpaghandha.description: Rauvolfia serpentina. <250 mature plants in wild (IUCN 2023). CITES Appendix II.

Rauvolfia serpentina.description: Rauvolfia serpentina. <250 mature plants in wild (IUCN 2023). CITES Appendix II.
